law.text: All persons required by this article to have a license that are operating a business shall have thirty (30) days from the application of this article to file for any required license. The Inspection Department shall inspect each rooming business annually to determine compliance. (Ord. No. 1992-31, ยง1, 8-4-92) Cross reference: Compliance with fair housing and landlord and tenant laws, ยง12-2160
